Title: Master of the Brews: It's a kegger!

ItemTooltips.blink: Get this to initiate from a distance and to chase / get away from enemies. By initiating with BD you can use Primal Split before the enemy team can react to you.
ItemTooltips.travel_boots: Makes it so you can be anywhere on the map to either push or assist in kills.
ItemTooltips.phase_boots: Makes chasing enemies easier and gives a nice damage boost. It allows you to move through units once activated for 4 sec.
ItemTooltips.vladmir: Just like AC this item's aura will be kept in play during Primal Split.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: Increases the duration of your Primal Split and reduces the cooldown.
ItemTooltips.assault:
AC is best used against heavy physical damage teams, due to the armor gain.
Also, the armor reduction will even effect enemy towers, thus making pushing easier.
AC's aura will be kept in play even when Brewmaster uses Primal Split.
ItemTooltips.heart: Makes it so you're able to sustain a lot more damage.
ItemTooltips.shivas_guard: Nice passive that slows enemy's AS. Besides that it also has a  Active  effect which deals a nice amount of damage and slows the enemy's movement speed by 40%.
ItemTooltips.radiance: Radiance on all the pandas while in Primal Split... Do I need to say more?
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: Gives a passive aura and a Active buff for a low price.
